title: Mark301
author: Mark301
content: What do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: None. They're used to get your money. It's basically a pyramid scheme, and you're in the losing end.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: The best crypto signal groups are the ones that you will later find to scam you. It would be best for you to avoid those crypto signal groups, they will only later seek for money from you in one way or the other and if you pay, then you are scammed. Better to learn how to trade, use the amount of money you can afford to lose to trade and gain more experience as you continue to trade.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Crypto signal groups are going to be something that would make you regret even buying a cent of it. It's not worth it to continue, and it never will be. You can get decent signals sometimes, but they will not always be reliable. I think it's better to analyze on your own so you can blame yourself. It's just that simple, IMO.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Quote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?This has been asked multiple times in this forum. I honestly think there are a chain of newbie accounts here who are creating threads and asking the same question (with different titles and mixed unique sentences as long its related to the best crypto signals).I just didn’t know if anyone of you have already noticed this? It’s just based in my own experience. Hmmm…..

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?All telegram groups are scam. Nothing is useful. And yes don’t fall for their traps and take their VIP pass.If you want some free yet somehow okayish call, then you can follow some veteran crypto traders on Twitter.They basically tells which coins might grow and which not, accordingly buy and sell. This isn’t a great method but yes it’s sufficient for free calls.And yes as always before investing on any coin do prior research and invest.

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: Quote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?Never get fooled with your imaginations that a telegram or one from these crypto signals is reliable, you'd perhaps be a target now by scammers. I suggest you do not trust any of them, don't make yourself believe any of these crypto signals but rather help yourself to understand trading by your own and developer strategies as to whether you like it or not, nothing can help but just yourselves.If you are aware of the telegram scam, you certainly are thinking of not joining them.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: Don't rely on crypto signals you see on telegram or any other social messaging app. If those were really accurate then everyone would really quit their job and just wait for those signals to place their trade. You will just lose money if you rely on someone when trading. If you really want to earn from trading then you should learn how to read charts and candlesticks by yourself.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: The best signal group is to have no group at all! People who join signal groups are on for a wild goose chase since it doesn't exist in the first place. And with you trying to pursue that non-existent place, these "groups" will simply use your ignorance for their benefit and then throw you away to cry at some random forum about getting scammed.So no, there's no "best" nor is there any actual group at all.

comments.author: fullhdpixel
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on July 25, 2022, 12:39:09 PMQuote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?All telegram groups are scam. Nothing is useful. And yes don’t fall for their traps and take their VIP pass.If you want some free yet somehow okayish call, then you can follow some veteran crypto traders on Twitter.They basically tells which coins might grow and which not, accordingly buy and sell. This isn’t a great method but yes it’s sufficient for free calls.And yes as always before investing on any coin do prior research and invest.There are lots of scams on telegram but I think there are few of them who are legit and carefully moderated by their admins. There must be a free trial first to know if the vip service are worth it to subscribe on or not but if you are doubting on them then you better stick on the free one's. Most of their signals can still be helpful if you aren't really good at analyzing on your own.Twitter is also a good platform when it comes to stuffs like this. We better look for that small blue check as that can show that the twitter user is verified. It will be hard for them to scam us or give fake information because they their account is more valuable than those who aren't verified.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Quote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?There are some that are legit, there are some that are just scams.I experienced some groups before, they cannot always be 100% guaranteed, so you should not risk them all.There is also some group that is copying some signals to other groups which are really dumb, you subscribe to 1 group just to get different signals from other groups, this is somehow risky too because in the first place they are not the one who provides it.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: cheezcarls on July 25, 2022, 12:19:47 PMThis has been asked multiple times in this forum. I honestly think there are a chain of newbie accounts here who are creating threads and asking the same question (with different titles and mixed unique sentences as long its related to the best crypto signals).I just didn’t know if anyone of you have already noticed this? It’s just based in my own experience. Hmmm…..Interestingly, i found OP inserting his signal group in a number of threads so you might be onto something   Quote from: Mark301 on June 10, 2022, 10:26:19 AMTrading is difficult. Profitable trading necessitates extensive training and knowledge. But, thanks to my crypto signals provider (mycryptoparadise), I'm profiting without having to do much.Quote from: Mark301 on June 08, 2022, 06:08:19 AMLearn everything there is to know about trading, as well as I use crypto signals from mycryptoparadise to turn my investments into profits. However, learning about candles, indicators, and other concepts is essential for getting started.Quote from: Mark301 on June 07, 2022, 04:27:14 AMApart from Bitcoin, you can search for many altcoins. Personally, I use crypto calls from MyCryptoParadise on the Telegram channel.Quote from: Mark301 on May 30, 2022, 11:17:18 AMDCADon't go for FOMODiversify your portfolioHold your positionJoin Crypto Call Group (MyCryptoParadise) like I did to trade and make profit.Note: this is not everything, there are more.I'd say try to see if the thread starter starts promoting in the process the next time you one again otherwise, it could just be beginners being beginners and asking one the FAQs.

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?There are a lot of reputable crypto telegram signal group out there , but I don't think this is the wisiest thing to do trading and depending on signals, even those people that you gonna rely on giving you this signals aren't professionals and you will end up losing money as a result of either not properly doing what they tell you because you don't have the skill. The best thing you should do is get yourself involvede with trading and acquire that knowledge/skill, So if you get signals you know how to properly use them in combination with your own analysis, in the end you will be able to get more profitable results.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?Waste of money and that's all. It's alarming and I'm starting to see people again on social media platforms about these paid signals. They're talking mostly with newbies that they encourage to join these paid signals. But, I also see people that are combatting against them and telling their experiences, so, even how hard you are trying to find new people that will pay your signals, there will be those people that haven't experienced good about you. Thus, if you're having these signals, just apply it to yourselves and be rich.

comments.author: bakasabo
comments.body: Better listen to bird singing, they are undisputed signal that spring came, instead of searching and taking for real telegram crypto signals. They all are fake. Such telegram channels are made only to earn on referral links or to sell ads. Such telegram channels dont even care about crypto, and dont have any responsibility. Instead, try to learn the market by yourself. And I hope everyone already know, that when you finds a signal, it is already to late to act.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?None of them don't rely on any crypto signal groups because this is been design to ask some money to their members and they used to hide on VIP trading signal group so that they will look professional to the eyes of their newbie members. Just learn how to trade for yourself since there are so many tutorials posted online and there are also videos on youtube so for sure if you are just resourceful guy you will find those reliable information which you can learn from.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: Mark301 on July 25, 2022, 09:25:35 AMWhat do you guys think is the best crypto signals group on Telegram?You will have to spend money to join them. They are mostly paid groups, not free ones.What groups are they? Pump and dump groups.Do you think that you will always be the earliest signal receivers and do you think the core members of a group did not buy before they public signals to group members?So the later you receive the signal, the later you follow their signal and buy, the higher risk and loss you will face with. It is your account, your money and your profit or loss, not that group owners.And in general, trading is very risky.

comments.author: Rufsilf
comments.body: You'd better stay away from theme before you will lose your money trusting these signal groups as apparently, it was just a trick. You always have to remember that nobody could able to rightly predict the incoming price change, it is all just a sort of market analysis and speculation which meant wrong in the end. And suppose to ask helps from these group, you'd better think about learning it how - as you can also make your own analysis and market speculations.

comments.author: virasisog
comments.body: None, especiallg if they're using Telegram as a platform. Relying on signal groups will only lead you into more losses or worse, you might end up being scammed. Scammers are everywhere on the internet so yoj better be careful especially if they're offering a service that isn't reliable. Don't risk your funds on them but rather learn technical analysis so you'll be able to deal with the market using your own knowledge and skills.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: As many people have said there is no good in crypto signal group or trading they will still charge you a fee to get in there that's not even a 100% guarantee of our profits but they are just giving their guesses.But one of the good things is that you learn with a lot that is provided on the internet or in this forum so that you can improve your skills instead of relying on crypto signals, this is not good for you except learning in other ways.
